Articles.Content:
Difman Corp is a new company, specialising is militarized aircraft designed for handling, stability and firepower, all within a stock framework. The company plans to achieve the following aims:

1) To provide quality aircraft at reasonable costs

2) To develop and improve technologies

3) To explore new frontiers and go where no Kerbal has gone before.

4) To ensure that all aircraft are tested thoroughly and safely (sort of)

5) To push the boundaries of existing technology.

These goals help to provide a safe future for Kerbal society, by maintaining peace and prosperity.

Now to our products:

1) XFR-1

This experimental fighter jet was locked away in a warehouse for over 20 years after being deemed "unsafe". We have taken all the dust out, made improvements and put the dust back in, all for your enjoyment. So far only one photo has appeared:

NO PHOTO

Expect more from us soon!

Edited June 19, 2013 by thisiscool1
